name: 10 Coffee Package
fullDescription: A voucher for 10 coffees that you can enjoy any time. You pay for 9 and get 1 free!

name: Coffee and Cake
shortDescription: Delicious cup of coffee and cake
fullDescription: Enjoy our signature coffee and our amazingly delicious home made cake that has won so many awards for its unique taste.

name: Full English and Coffee
shortDescription: A full english breakfast with coffee
fullDescription: One of the best breakfasts you can ever have, combined with our signature coffee!

name: House Blend Coffee - 12 Months
shortDescription: A voucher for a year of coffee.
fullDescription: Don't need to worry about where you're gonna get your coffee for the entire next year! Get a voucher from your favorite coffee shop for 12 months of your favorite!

name: 10% off Food - 6 Months
shortDescription: Take 10% off any food item for the next 6 months
fullDescription: A great discount for our fans - take 10% off any food item at our cafe for the next 6 entire months!

name: Caffeinate the Keyworkers
fullDescription: Everyone could use some coffee. Pay it forward!

name: Party Booking - 5 Person
shortDescription: A party for 5 people at the party spot!
fullDescription: There's no better place to have a party than the Family Bean. With this package you can get a party for 5 with all the details included! Birthday, anniversary, whatever it is we can do it!

name: 30% off All Products - 1 Year
shortDescription: 30% off your bill of anything in our cafe for a whole year!
fullDescription: Love our cafe so much that you want to come in every single day for a whole year! Might as well get 30% off! And you can do that now while supporting us through this tough time.

name: Red Velvet Cake
shortDescription: This traditional red velvet cake is layered with flavor in every bite! Smooth-topped with cream cheese icing, and made with classic vanilla / rich chocolate, you'll receive this decadent cake freshly baked on a day of your choosing when our operations resume.
fullDescription: This traditional red velvet cake is layered with flavor in every bite! Smooth-topped with cream cheese icing, and made with classic vanilla / rich chocolate, you'll receive this decadent cake freshly baked on a day of your choosing when our operations resume.

name: Massage
shortDescription: Relieve your stress with a massage
fullDescription: A full body massage that will ease your tension and make you feel amazing!

name: 10 Sandwiches
shortDescription: Love our sandwiches? Get 10 at a time for the price of 8.
fullDescription: With this voucher you have 10 sandwiches ready for you whenever you want them and you only paid for 8!

name: Window Washing
fullDescription: Can't see out your windows and desperately need them cleaned? This is your chance to get a great deal!
